details:
This update fixes a denial of service vulnerability in leptonlib. It can be
made to crash with an arithmetic exception on specially crafted JPEG files.


For Debian 10 buster, this problem has been fixed in version
1.76.0-1+deb10u2.


We recommend that you upgrade your leptonlib packages.


For the detailed security status of leptonlib please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/leptonlib>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
